釕字的基本解释

釕
liǎo

釕
liào
均见“钌”。

釕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎo］
［《廣韻》都了切，上篠，端。］
［《集韻》朗鳥切，上筱，來。］
“钌1”的繁体字。
(1)以金属装饰器物。参见“釕轡”。
(2)金属元素。符号Ru。银灰色，质硬而脆，有时是海绵状或碎片。釕存在于铂矿中，量极少，可用来制装饰品、合金等。
[②]［liào］
“钌2”的繁体字。
见“釕2銱”。

釕字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　釕； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1295第06
【廣韻】都了切【集韻】丁了切，?音鳥。【廣韻】釕鈌，帶頭飾。【集韻】鋌釕也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?朗鳥切，音了。義同。

釕字的源字形

釕字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎo］
["Guangyun" has been cut, Shang Xiao, end. ]
["Ji Yun" Lang bird cut, Shang Xiao, come. ]
Traditional characters for "Ru 1".
(1) Decorate objects with metal. See "ruthenium bridle".
(2) Metal elements. Symbol Ru. Silver-gray, hard and brittle, sometimes spongy or fragmented. Ruthenium exists in platinum ore, the amount is very small, can be used to make decorations, alloys and so on.
[②]［liào］
Traditional characters for "Ru 2".
See "Ruthenium 2銱".
ruthenium
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　Ru; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1295 Page 06
[Guang Yun] All cuts [Ji Yun] Ding cuts, sound bird. [Guangyun] Ruthenium 鈌, with headdress. 【Ji Yun】Ting Ru also.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] again? Long bird cut, the sound is over. The same meaning.
